company.name: Loadsmart
company.description: Loadsmart is a startup founded in 2014 and based in Chicago. They provide logistic services for the US and                Canadian markets acting as a broker, connecting shippers with carriers. Loadsmart also has a division that provides SaaS for the logistics industry.

activities: Promoted 8 direct reports, including the first company Staff Engineer

company.name: Crossover
company.description: Crossover is one of the companies of [ESW Capital](https://www.linkedin.com/company/eswcapital/about/). Based in Austin, Texas, the ESW Capital group specifically focuses on buying, strengthening, and then growing mature business software companies.

activities: Aurea: Maintenance of Java Systems responsible for exchanging Electronic Data Interchange (EDI)
Trilogy: Migration of source code from different Version Control Systems to Github

Optiva: Maintenance and development of new features for Optiva Business Support Systems (BSS) solutions Java development for telephony billing. Development using a proprietary language and platform to process billing scenarios for the telecommunications industry
